 前のクラス   次のクラス フレームあり    フレームなし

メソッドの詳細

setOAuthToken

public void setOAuthToken(OAuthToken oAuthToken)
Set the OAuthToken to create OAuthAuthorizaiont. If AccessToken and AccessTokenSecret provided by Ohloh.

パラメータ:
oAuthToken -

getConfiguration

public Configuration getConfiguration()
Returns the configuration.

戻り値:
the Configuration.

getOAuthRequestToken

public OAuthRequestToken getOAuthRequestToken()
                                       throws OhlohException
Retrieves a request token

戻り値:
generated request token.
例外:
OhlohException - when network unavailable.
IllegalStateException - access token is already available
関連項目:
OAuth Core 1.0a - 6.1. Obtaining an Unauthorized Request Token

getOAuthAccessToken

public OAuthAccessToken getOAuthAccessToken()
                                     throws OhlohException
Returns an access token associated with this instance.
If no access token is associated with this instance, this will retrieve a new access token.

戻り値:
access token
例外:
IllegalStateException - when RequestToken has never been acquired
OhlohException - when network unavailable.
関連項目:
OAuth Core 1.0a - 6.2. Obtaining User Authorization
